special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Yusdrayl is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). She knows the following sorcerer spells:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, mage armor
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, mage armor

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
descriptions: While in sunlight, Yusdrayl has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: Yusdrayl has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
